About the apartment
This elegant and stylish Parisian two-bedroom flat is located on the fourth floor of a secure, residential building with an elevator. It is 60 sqm with lovely parquet flooring, and large windows overlooking the streets of Paris and the inner courtyard.

The flat has a nice and intimate living, dining and kitchen area with a flat screen TV and free Wi-Fi connection. The fireplaces and the modern yet refined style of the furnishings create a welcoming but sophisticated atmosphere. There is a dining table and chairs for 4 people should you choose to dine in one evening instead of eating out in a great restaurant in the neighbourhood. The kitchen is fully equipped with all the necessary tools you would need to cook a full meal. It comes with a stove, oven, dishwasher, refrigerator and freezer, coffee maker, teakettle, toaster, microwave and more. Full sets of cutlery and crockery are provided along with pots and pans and other utensils.

The first bedroom features a queen size bed, nightstands with bedside lamps. All bedding and linens are provided and you will find the beds neatly made on arrival. There is plenty of storage space for all of your belongings.

The bathroom features a shower and a separate water closet with toilet only; it is accessible from the main hallway. Luxurious and fluffy bath towels are provided for four guests. Complementary toilet rolls, shower gel, shampoo, hand soap and a hairdryer are also included to start of your stay.

The second bedroom contains a double size bed, bedside tables and a space to store your belongings. There is also a clothes washing machine so that you can launder your clothing during your stay and save room in your luggage for some special souvenirs from France. A drying rack is included for your convenience. An iron and ironing board are also provided.

The apartment is heated throughout during the winter months. There is no air conditioning but we will be happy to provide you with fans for your stay should warm weather be in the forecast. A member of our Welcoming Team will meet you upon arrival, give you the keys and a tour of the apartment and its appliances, help you to connect to the Wi-Fi and more. Management reserves the right to enter the property for purposes of inspection, maintenance, cleaning, to show the unit to potential purchasers or tenants. Nom: St Germain Des Pres Beautiful 2BR By La Seine
Description_type: Vous aurez le logement (appartement) rien que pour vous.
Description:
A beautiful vacation rental in the 6th Arrondissement, just off of rue de Seine!

Le logement
Apartment Overview:
- Beautifully decorated two bedroom, two bathroom Paris apartment rental
- Comfortably accommodates up to 4 people, great for a family or two couples
- 3rd floor flat with an elevator
- 80 sqm with a clothes washing/drying machine, cable TV and free Wi-Fi
- Located in center of St Germain des Pres, Paris 6th
- Nearest Metro: Mabillon (Line 10) or Saint Germain des Pres (Line 4)

About the apartment:
This exclusive Paris vacation rental is truly one of a kind and should be missed out on! It is located on the third floor of a secure residential building with an elevator. What makes this flat particularly special is the attention to detail and high quality furnishings and decorations throughout. It is 80 square meters in total and feels even bigger with its high ceilings with traditional wooden beams and the large windows allowing in plenty of natural light. Upon entering, you are greeted by the open-plan living and dining area. Here you‚Äôll find a sofa and two armchairs you can sink into after a long day of sightseeing in Paris. There is a 50-inch plasma flat screen television with cable for your enjoyment. Here you will also find a dining table and chairs for four should you feel like dining in one evening instead of going out to one of the best restaurants in Saint Germain des Pres.


Just off of the living area lies the compact but fully equipped kitchen. It contains a 4-plate electric stove, oven, dishwasher, refrigerator and freezer, toaster, coffee maker, teakettle and more. Full sets of cutlery and crockery are provided along with pots and pans and other utensils so you can easily prepare a meal at home. There is also a clothes washing and drying machine so you can pack lightly and save room in your luggage for some typical Parisian souvenirs. An iron and board are also at your disposal should you need to dress fancy in Paris.

The Master bedroom is situated off the living room and features a beautiful, calming colour scheme, mood lighting and a comfortable queen size bed. There are also night tables and bedside lamps for your convenience. This bedroom faces the street and common city noise is to be expected considering the extremely central location of the apartment. The bedroom has a giant walk-through closet which leads to the en-suite bathroom. The modern bathroom has a combination bathtub/shower, toilet, hand basin, heated towel rail and hair dryer. Complementary toilet rolls, shampoos, shower gels and hand soap will be provided to start off your stay. Luxurious bath towels are provided for 4 people.

The second bedroom is located at the rear of the flat. It contains a comfortable double bed and plenty of storage space for your belongings to you can unpack your luggage and feel at home in Paris during your stay. This bedroom faces an interior courtyard and provides a quieter environment for a good night‚Äôs sleep. The second bathroom is located en-suite to this bedroom. It contains a walk-in shower, toilet, bidet and sink.

The apartment is heated throughout during the winter months. There is no air conditioning but we will be happy to provide you with fans for your stay should warm temperatures be in the Paris weather forecast.

A member of our Welcoming Team will meet you upon arrival, give you the keys and entry codes, a tour of the apartment and its appliances, help you to connect to the Wi-Fi and more. You‚Äôll have access to a personal guidebook with suggestions on where to eat and shop in Paris as well as things to do in Saint Germain des Pres.

Management reserves the right to enter the property for purposes of inspection, maintenance, cleaning, to show the unit to potential purchasers or tenants. This will be exercised in a reasonable fashion and always provide written notice in advance, except in cases of emergency. Your comprehension and cooperation are appreciated.

Acc√®s des voyageurs
Free Wi-Fi and internet codes, guides and information on Paris, sheets, towels, soaps and much more!

Autres remarques
A baby bed can be provided upon request for an additional fee of 40‚Ç¨ for your stay. A baby chair can be provided for 40‚Ç¨. Both can be provide for 60‚Ç¨. Please confirm after your reservation is confirmed.

When sending an inquiry or placing a booking request, please include as many details about yourself and the people you are traveling with. Who are you? What do you do for a living? What brings you to the city? Have you read through the strict flat policies and do you intend to respect them?

Remember a fully-refundable 800‚Ç¨ damage deposit will be held to cover damage, breakage of rules, loss of keys, etc.

In the instance that you arrive between 7:00PM and 9:00PM there will be a 30 ‚Ç¨ late check-in fee, if you arrive even later, between 9:00PM and 11:00PM the check-in fee will be 50 ‚Ç¨. Between 11:00PM and 1:00AM the check-in fee will be 80 ‚Ç¨. After 1:00AM there will be a 100‚Ç¨ check-in fee. This fee is payable in cash in local currency.

Cosy vacation rental in the heart of the 1st Arrondissement, seconds from the Louvre and Jardin des Tuileries!

Le logement
Apartment Overview:
- Large open-plan studio with double bed and sofa bed on the chic Rue St Honore
- Comfortably accommodates up to 4 people
- 2nd floor apartment without an elevator
- 50 square meter apartment with washer/dryer, cable TV and free Wi-Fi
- Nearest metro: Palais Royale ‚Äì Musee de Louvre (Lines 1 and 7)

About the apartment:
This spacious and charming apartment is located on the second floor of a traditional and secure Parisian apartment building without a lift. Upon entering the apartment, you are met with a long hallway. On the left hand side is the bathroom, with double his and hers sinks as well as an oversized corner bath and shower. This bathroom has a toilet, heated towel rail and storage space. There is a clothes washing and drying machine for your convenience so you may pack lightly and save room in your luggage for those special Parisian souvenirs. An iron and ironing board are also at your disposal. Complementary toilet rolls, shampoos, shower gels, hand soap and a hair dryer will be provided to start off your stay. Luxurious bath towels are provided for four guests as well.

Moving on, you‚Äôll find the large open-plan living and sleeping area. There is a large double bed, which can be separated from the living area by a folding screen. The living area has a comfortable isofa that can be pulled out into a double sofa bed for the additional sleeping space for two people. This area also has a large flat screen television with a mix of French, English and foreign language channels. The living area contains a dining table and chairs for four, so that you can enjoy meals together in the apartment with some of the local produce available nearby.

The apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar where you can eat your freshly purchased croissants from the bakery just downstairs ‚Äì a great way to start your day in Paris! The kitchen has a 2-plate electric stovetop and extractor hood. There is also a Nespresso machine, kettle, microwave, fridge and all the utensils, plates and cutlery you could need for your stay.

The apartment is heated throughout during the winter months. There is no air conditioning but we will be happy to provide you with fans for your visit should warm temperatures be in the Paris weather forecast. There is a fast and free Wi-Fi connection available so that you can stay connected during your stay. Upon arrival, a member of our Welcoming Team will meet you, give you the keys and entry codes, a tour of the apartment and its appliances, help you to connect to the Wi-Fi and more. You‚Äôll find a personal guidebook in the flat with suggestions on where to eat and shop in Paris.

Management reserves the right to enter the property for purposes of inspection, maintenance, cleaning, to show the unit to potential purchasers or tenants. This will be exercised in a reasonable fashion and always provide written notice in advance, except in cases of emergency. Your comprehension and cooperation are appreciated.

About the apartment:
This stunning 100sqm apartment is located in a secure residential building with coded access in a safe and unbelievably central part of Paris. The flat is on the 3rd floor with an elevator.

Upon entering the apartment, you are welcomed into the sleek modern kitchen. This kitchen is fully equipped for all of your needs during your stay in Paris. The kitchen is fully equipped with all the pots, pans, cutlery, utensils and crockery that you could need during your stay. The kitchen has a 5 gas ring stove for cooking, a dishwasher, microwave, oven, fridge and freezer. There is a small American style breakfast bar so you can snack or simply chat with a glass of wine while you cook dinner. There is also a washer/dryer for your convenience with an iron and ironing board.

The apartment feels spacious and light thanks to many large windows and a sizeable hallway running down the rear of the property. The first room off the hallway is the living and dining area. Here you will find a large comfortable leather sofa on which you can recline and watch the flat screen television, which has a mix of French, English and foreign language channels. There is also a dining table for 4 in case you choose to cook at home with some of the fresh local produce.

The 2 bedrooms are interconnected and both are accessible off the hallway. The first bedroom has a traditional wooden piano, unfortunately for decoration only, as well as a large ornamental fireplace and mirror. The windows open up onto the Parisian streets below, allowing you to take in the sights, smells and sounds of Paris. Both bedrooms have a comfortable double bed and storage space for all of your clothes during your stay. All bedding, sheets and pillows are provided and you will find the beds neatly made on arrival.

Finally the bathroom and toilet are separate from both bedrooms. The bathroom has a full sized bath as well as a separate walk-in shower with a rainforest head. There is a hairdryer provided for you should you require one. Complementary toilet rolls, shampoos, shower gels and hand soap will be provided to start off your stay. Luxurious bath towels are provided for 4 people. The toilet is located in a separate water closet inside the flat.

The apartment is heated throughout during the winter months. There is no air conditioning but we will be happy to provide you with fans for your stay should warm temperatures be in the Paris weather forecast.

A member of our Welcoming Team will meet you upon arrival, give you the keys and entry codes, a tour of the apartment and its appliances, help you to connect to the Wi-Fi and more. You‚Äôll have access to a personal guidebook with suggestions on where to eat and shop in Paris as well as things to do in Le Marais.

Management reserves the right to enter the property for purposes of inspection, maintenance, cleaning, to show the unit to potential purchasers or tenants. Beautifully renovated flat on Paris‚Äôs Left Bank, just next to the March√© Saint Germain!

About the apartment:
This newly renovated Parisian apartment rental is located on the 1st floor of a secure residential building without an elevator. The open-plan kitchen is fully equipped with a 4 plate electric cooker, oven and dishwasher, as well as a fridge, toaster, coffee maker etc. Full sets of cutlery and crockery are provided along with pots and pans to help you cook some of the delicious French produce available nearby. The large bedroom is situated off the living room where you'll find a large double bed for two people. Luxurious bedding is provided and you will find the bed neatly made upon arrival. The bedroom features an en-suite bathroom with a walk-in shower and sink. Fluffy, white bath towels are provided for four guests. Complementary toilet rolls, shower gel, shampoo and hand soap are also included to start of your stay.

The apartment is heated throughout during the winter months. There is no air conditioning but we will be happy to provide you with fans for your stay should warm temperatures be in the Paris weather forecast.

A member of our Welcoming Team will meet you upon arrival, give you the keys and a tour of the apartment and its appliances, help you to connect to the Wi-Fi and more. You‚Äôll find a personal guidebook in the apartment with tips and suggestions on where to eat and shop in Saint Germain des Pres.

"Noise"
There's no need to tiptoe around in your socks or communicate in whispers (unless you're whispering sweet nothings). You are staying in a relatively old building with a wood structure that transmit impact noise (Avoid walking across wood floor with stiletto heels, don‚Äôt jump or move furniture at night)
"Nice behaviour"
The person that books the apartment needs to make sure that everyone acts responsibly. So for a few days, you‚Äôll be the Big Brother - the responsible one. In case of extreme misbehavior, the apartment manager has the right to ask people to leave the apartment and any right to compensation might be lost. Nom: Studio 30m2 Paris 20e P√®re Lachaise
Description_type: Vous aurez le logement (appartement) rien que pour vous.
Description:
Le logement
As I travel quite often, I rent out my studio - the flat I really live in. It's in a lovely downtown Parisian neighborhood, Gambetta, 6 minutes walk from the famous P√®re Lachaise cemetery. My 30 m2 studio in a 1920's building is very sunny, has a separated kitchen (brand-new fridge & washing machine; gas oven, kettle, toaster, citrus press), bathroom with bath tub, separated toilets. The main room, usually full of light - and with blinds if you need them - has a sofa-bed with Simmons mattress and an extra padding sleeping two. And a new fan/ventilator for the very hot summer days. Elevator in the building. The entrance to the building is secured by a 'badge' so only people who live there can enter the building. Bedding, sheets and towels are provided. A fast WiFi internet connection is included in the price.There is a typically Parisian street market with fresh produce (vegetables, fruits, cheese) every Wednesday and Saturday morning. A huge supermarket (Monoprix) with a wide range of organic options is just around the corner, as well as one of the finest bakeries in town. The area is full of smaller supermarkets (some very cheap ones) and shops (a special cheese shop and an excellent chocolate manufacturer, just to name the two). The MK2 cinema on place Gambetta shows films in their original version with subtitles, so mostly in English. If you're fluent in French, there are a famous national and several alternative theaters in the neighborhood. Not to forget all the caf√©s & eateries. In short, you'll be able to feel the vibrant and 'real' Parisian life outside your door (URL HIDDEN) flat is cleaned with environmentally friendly cleaners only. Sustainability is part of my everyday life philosophy.If you have any kind of allergies (feathers, gluten, lactose), please let me know in advance and I'll do my best to meet your needs. If you are vegan, I'll be more than happy to provide you with specific groceries. I am a vegetarian myself and could give you suggestions of the best veggy places in Paris. As a non-smoker, I expect people not to smoke at home, and to be careful with my place. Feel free to contact me if you need more information of any kind.You can reach my place from CDG airport in 1h and from Orly airport in 1h10 using public transportation, and in 20 min by taxi (when no traffic jams).Metro stations Pelleport (line 3b, 1-min-walk away from home), Gambetta (line 3 & 3b, a 5-min-walk away ) or T√©l√©graphe (line 11, a 10-min-walk away). Directly from Gambetta, you'll reach R√©publique in 5 min, Op√©ra in 14 min. Changing once : Louvre in 25 min, les Champs-Elys√©es in 30 min.From T√©l√©graphe, you get to Beaubourg/H√¥tel de Ville and Ch√¢telet in 12-13 min.Downtown Paris (zone 1 for the public transportation system) means there are, besides three metro lines, several city bus lines running directly to all the important touristic sites. I always encourage my guests to take the busses as it's a lovely way to explore the city, watching neighborhoods connect and change, making the discovery of Paris truly amazing. Among many other Paris city guides and maps and specific schedules for the airport suburban trains, I provide a very detailed guide for all the busses running through Paris, with each stop clearly marked.Bus 69 takes you directly to the Louvre, the Orsay Museum, Invalides, the Eiffel Tower and rides alongside the Seine to all those breathtaking spots Paris is famous for.Bus 96 takes you to the heart of Paris : the old Marais neighborhood, rue Oberkampf, H√¥tel de Ville (the city hall of Paris), Ch√¢telet, Notre Dame cathedral, St Michel, St Germain de Pr√®s, ending at the Montparnasse train station with trains leaving to the West of France.Bus 26 takes you through the bucolic East of Paris to the railroad stations Gare du Nord (Airport trains, Thalys, Eurostar), Gare de l'Est and Gare St Lazare - all of them being major train stations.Bus 60 takes you to the beautiful Buttes Chaumonts park nearby, and to Montmartre.Bus 61 will take you in 15-20 minutes to the Gare de Lyon and Gare d'Austerlitz (two major train stations). All the listed busses stop next to my place.If you enjoy biking, there is a Velib' station (public bikes) next to my place. I do expect my guests to leave my place perfectly cleaned.Sometimes, especially if you contact me in advance, I might be able to adjust my traveling to your dates. Or, if you're planning to come to Paris but don't know exactly when, check in with me and I may tell you when I'll be away next time.Please contact me through airbnb.Studio 30 m2 √† louer dans Paris 20e, pr√®s du P√®re Lachaise, m¬∞ Gambetta ou Pelleport, dans quartier tr√®s sympa et vivant, lumineux, confortable sofa-lit pour deux, cuisine √©quip√©e d'une cuisini√®re √† gaz, d'un frigo et d'une machine √† laver, salle de bain avec baignoire, WC s√©par√© ; ascenseur. Electricit√©, gaz, internet (wifi) compris.

Description:
Spacious apartment rental in the center of Paris, close to Le Marais, Chatelet, le Louvre and more!

Le logement
Apartment Overview:


Charming 1 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment in the chic 2nd arrondissement
Comfortably accommodates up to 4 guests with a sofa bed in the living room
1st floor apartment without an elevator
55 square meter apartment with washing machine, cable TV and free Wi-Fi connection
Seconds to Rue Montorgueil and the Pompidou Center
Nearest metro: Etienne Marcel (Line 4)



About the apartment:

This 55sqm apartment is located on the first floor of a secure, coded residential building without an elevator. It was recently renovated and has been beautifully redone to offer modern comforts in the city centre.



Upon entering the apartment, you are greeted by a spacious hallway that leads you into the living room. The kitchen spans along this hallway and includes a 4-plate induction stove, oven, dishwasher, coffee machine and fridge/freezer. It is furnished with all of the utensils, crockery and cutlery you could need during your stay. There is plenty of counter space to prepare delicious home cooked meals with fresh ingredients from the Rue Montorgueil markets nearby. The kitchen also contains a washing machine so that you can pack light and save room in your luggage for those special Parisian souvenirs. There is a drying rack in the flat for your convenience.



The room then opens up into the living and dining area. There is a dining table for four people to enjoy some meals at home when you don‚Äôt feel like trying out one of the many nearby restaurants. The living room has a flat screen television with free cable and a range of international channels, a decorative fireplace and two chairs. There is also a comfortable sofa bed to accommodate 2 additional guests if required.



To the right of the living room is the bedroom, which is beautifully modern and chic and with a comfortable double bed. Fresh sheets and linens are provided and you‚Äôll find the bed neatly made upon arrival. The bedroom also contains nightstands with bed lamps and a writing desk. The bedroom faces the street but thanks to its double glazed windows, you are sure to get a quiet nights‚Äô sleep. There are interior shutters to block out the light to keep the sun from waking you too early in the morning.



The bedroom has an en suite bathroom with a large walk in shower, sink, hair dryer and heated towel rail. The hallway from the bedroom to the bathroom is lined ample storage space, making it easy to store away your clothes and suitcases during your stay. The toilet is separate and is located just by the kitchen, so it is easily accessible to all. On arrival, complimentary towels, toilet rolls, shower gel and hand soap will be provided to start your stay.

The apartment is heated throughout during the winter months. There is no air conditioning but we will be happy to provide you with fans for your visit should warm temperatures be in the Paris weather forecast.



A member of our Welcoming Team will meet you upon arrival, give you the keys and entry codes, a tour of the apartment and its appliances, help you to connect to the Wi-Fi and more. You‚Äôll find a personal guidebook in the flat with suggestions on where to eat and shop in Paris.
Management reserves the right to enter the property for purposes of inspection, maintenance, cleaning, to show the unit to potential purchasers or tenants. This will be exercised in a reasonable fashion and always provide written notice in advance, except in cases of emergency. Your comprehension and cooperation are appreciated.

Acc√®s des voyageurs
Free Wi-Fi and internet codes, guides and information on Paris, sheets, towels, soaps and much more!

Autres remarques
A baby bed can be provided upon request for an additional fee of 40‚Ç¨ for your stay. A baby chair can be provided for 40‚Ç¨. Both can be provide for 60‚Ç¨. Please confirm after your reservation is confirmed.

When sending an inquiry or placing a booking request, please include as many details about yourself and the people you are traveling with. Who are you? What do you do for a living? What brings you to the city? Have you read through the strict flat policies and do you intend to respect them?

Remember a fully-refundable 800‚Ç¨ damage deposit will be held to cover damage, breakage of rules, loss of keys, etc.

In the instance that you arrive between 7:00PM and 9:00PM there will be a 30 ‚Ç¨ late check-in fee, if you arrive even later, between 9:00PM and 11:00PM the check-in fee will be 50 ‚Ç¨. Between 11:00PM and 1:00AM the check-in fee will be 80 ‚Ç¨. After 1:00AM there will be a 100‚Ç¨ check-in fee. This fee is payable in cash in local currency.

Nom: Beautiful & Peaceful Champs Elysees apt. with AC
Description_type: Vous aurez le logement (appartement) rien que pour vous.
Description:
Located just 50 meters from the world famous Champs-√âlys√©es avenue, this sleek, quiet and ultra comfortable one-bedroom apartment is located on the 4th floor of a building with 24-hour security and an elevator. The unit sleeps up to four adults comfortably. It is professionally and meticulously serviced and sanitized prior to each guests' arrival. This bright luxurious space is the perfect place to wind down after a day of sightseeing. It comes fully equipped w/ all major appliances and WIFI.

Le logement
The apartment is located on the fourth floor of a very nice building which has an elevator.
The unit sleeps up to four adults comfortably and has a lovely view to flowered gardens. There is a very comfortable new queen size bed in the bedroom and a double sofa bed in the living room.
It is the perfect place to wind down after a day of sightseeing, with a soft mattress and luscious bedsheets and pillows. The property is surrounded by wonderful restaurants, cafes, bakeries, shops and more. There are two grocery stores within walking distance, such as Monoprix and Cocinelle.

It comes equipped with AC, a washer and a dryer, as well as all other necessary appliances, a hair dryer, towels, linens and a combination safe. The apartment has central heating, but we also offer space heaters during the winter months to those who prefer to be extra warm. Upon arrival, all guests are greeted by either myself, or my assistant with goodies to enjoy throughout their stay, as well as to give a tour of the apartment and answer any questions you might have.
Once inside the property, you will find a guidebook with instructions for taking the metro to recommendations of some of our favorite restaurants to dine in.

From the airport, to get to the building, you have several options:

- You could take the Air France nonstop shuttle bus service from Orly or CDG to the Place Charles de Gaulle/Etoile.
They run every 30 minutes and the travel time is about an hour.
From there, you only have a 5 to 7 minutes walk down the Champs Elysees avenue to get to the building.
- You could take a regular taxi right outside the terminal. Just make sure you get into one waiting in line.
- I could arrange for a driver to pick you up, with a car service company I use on a regular basis.
So far , they have been very reliable and professional. I have negotiated with them a flat fee of 65 euros, with no additional fees for extra luggage. (For up to three passengers. Otherwise, the price increases by 5 euros per each additional passenger).
If you want that service, I can schedule it for you, one way or round trip, but you will have to pay the driver directly. Unfortunately, they do not take credit cards.

Upon arrival at the property, you will be met by either myself, or my assistant.
We will be there to hand you the keys and answer any questions you may have.

Most major tourist attractions are within walking distance.
The Louvre, the Arc of Triumph and the Eiffel Tower are just a short distance away.
You will also find the Georges V metro station a block from the building and taxis are readily available all around.

There is free Wi-Fi and unlimited free calling to USA and Canada cell and land lines from the unit's phone.
In addition to free calls to land lines to an additional 102 countries.

The building has 24 hour security and is ideally located right off the Champs Elysees Avenue.
Basically, in a very central, safe and wonderful location.

Acc√®s des voyageurs
The entire apartment.

Autres remarques
The apartment is professionally and meticulously cleaned, serviced and sanitized prior to each guests' arrival.

I have worked many years in the furniture and design business in France but also abroad.

With big window, you can enjoy the great view over the Pantheon. In Winter, there is a good heater and in Summer, the same that does AC (although temperatures are mild).

My studio has all the modern fittings with attention to details and all necessary equipment you will need to enjoy your stay.

I hope you will enjoy staying at the Nest as much as I do! ...
***
*****
Here is a F.A.Q about the flat, hope it helps you have a better idea about your future experience with me

1. What is the rental process?
Just select your dates, number of people, and go through with the booking,

2. What would the total be for renting your place between certain dates?
It depends on what you select when you go through the booking (the price should be indicated once you have selected dates and number of people etc on the booking page for the apartment). ( cf. #1).

3. Would there be a deposit? If so how much would it be?
Yes there is. You pay it to AirBnB, and they give it back to you 2 days after you are out of the flat if everything goes normal.
I have never had a problem before, and all of my guests have collected their deposit back. The Deposit is 200‚Ç¨.

Acc√®s des voyageurs
The entire studio is available to my guests.

- It comes with a Queen size bed (new mattress and two pillows).
- A fully equipped kitchen including a fridge, a washing machine, a boiler, a microwave/grill, a stove, pans and plates etc ...
- A fully equipped bathroom including a wc, a sink and an Italian shower
- Basics like salt/pepper/spices/olive oil are available to use.
- Clean sheets and towels.
- AC/Heater/TV/iron iron table /hair dryer ...

- If you are a coffee lover, all the fancy gear you need is here: French Cafetiere and Nespresso machine. Welecome to bring your favorite beans, your capsules and enjoy your coffee.

- If you are arriving on Sundays or a Bank Holidays , since it is Paris, all shops are opened until late.

- Wifi - Yes there is a digital connection with the rest of the world and it is unlimited, during your stay at the studio.

- Cleaning fee. I expect to find the place in the same condition when you leave as you arrived. Tidy and clean. I do charge a cleaning fee for complete cleaning between guests including the sheets and towels, paper, basics like tea/coffee etc.

Washing machine, vacuum cleaner and cleaning liquid are available to use.

--------------------------

SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS

The studio sleeps 2.
Queen size bed 140 cm - 2 people sleep comfortable.
2 pillows/duvet cover and bedsheets / 1 towel per person.

Autres remarques
- The studio is right in the central part of Paris so you can find anything you wish at any time with shops opened untl late.
- I am kindly asking guests to clean the dishes, empty the fridge, gather your used bedsheets and towels, close the window, switch off the lighting, put the garbage back to the bin's area and return the key back to the mailbox when you check out.
- Please make sure you have read the info about the manual sent before checking in.
- Please note the studio is tiny (this is our Parisian standard: the area is the highest price per sqm in the world in the area with price around 15 to 20ke/sqm!) so if you fancy living like a local, the place is for you!

Bordering the Seine River and just beside Notre Dame Cathedral, this exceptional location in the heart of the Quartier Latin is extremely popular. It is one of the most youthful areas of Paris and also encompasses historical points of interest; for example it has been the center of Parisian education since the Middle Ages.In the nearby pedestrian streets there are many diverse restaurants and cafes, clothing boutiques, bookstores‚Ä¶other services are found along the Boulevard Saint Michel, where the Sorbonne is located, and in the neighboring famous Boulevard Saint Germain. It is a pleasant walk to many famous destinations such as Notre Dame,The Louvre, Centre Pompidou,Saint-Sulplice Church, Jardin du Luxembourg, Mus√©e D'Orsay,Invalides,Concorde,Madeleine,Grand-Palais, Champs-Elys√©es and of course the walking paths alway Seine River going toward Jardin des Plants and the Natural Museum and Zoo.It is very close proximity to two main subway station Saint-Michel and Odeon which also provide diredt access by rail to Versailles, Charles de Gaulle and Orly airports.Numerous bus lines can be found nearly to you conveniently all over Paris.This 30m¬≤ studio apartment is located on the second floor (third in the USA) of a well-maintained 17th century walk-up building. The street‚Äôs entrance gate is protected by a coded security system and it opens onto a paved interior courtyard, which leads to an old-fashioned staircase. The entrance door opens onto the living / sleeping room. On the left hand side there is an open kitchen and straight ahead is the bedroom area. The bathroom is accessible through the bedroom.The apartment has a northwest exposure. The floor has typical Parisian old-fashioned tiles (tommette) and there are ceiling beams. The living room has a window that overlooks the courtyard. It is furnished in an antique style with a desk, chair, a wooden dining table, a bench, two armchairs, a coffee table and a double bed. There are built-in shelves that hold a flat screen cable TV with its DVD player. There is also a decorative fireplace. The large walk in closet has shelves, a wardrobe, a laundry machine (combo washer / dryer) and an extra twin bed. The open kitchen is stylish in a contemporary way. It is equipped with two vitro-ceramic burners, a combo microwave / grill oven, a dishwasher, a refrigerator/ freezer, a coffee maker and a toaster.The bathroom has stone walls and ceiling beams. It is equipped with a bathtub with a showerhead, a sink and a toilet.The nearest metro station is Saint Michel (line 4, RER C).

- Comfortable one bedroom flat with a double bed and a sofa bed
- Perfect for a couple or family with children searching for an affordable holiday rental in Paris

About the apartment:
This cosy Parisian apartment is situated in a secure residential building with coded access. The 40 sqm apartment is located on the 4thd floor with an elevator and features typical street views. The open-plan living, kitchen and dining area is tastefully decorated and fully furnished with a sofa, flat screen television with local channels, a coffee table, a dining table and chairs for four and more. The couch transforms into a comfortable double bed to provide additional sleeping arrangements for two people and extra linens are provided. A free Wi-Fi connection is available throughout the flat.

The small but fully equipped kitchen is equipped with a stove, microwave oven, refrigerator, toaster, coffee maker, teakettle and more. Full sets of cutlery and crockery are provided along with pots and pans and other utensils. An iron and board are available for your use. There is a clothes washing machine and a drying rack is provided.

The cosy bedroom contains a double bed with a quality mattress. All bedding, sheets and pillows are provided, and you will find the bed neatly made on arrival. Just off the bedroom lies the bathroom with a walk-in shower, sink, toilet and hair dryer. Complementary toilet rolls, shampoos, shower gels and hand soap will be provided to start off your stay. Luxurious bath towels are provided for 4 people.

The apartment is heated throughout during the winter months. There is no air conditioning but we will be happy to provide you with fans for your stay should warm temperatures be in the Paris weather forecast. A member of our Welcoming Team will meet you upon arrival, give you the keys and entry codes, a tour of the apartment and its appliances, help you to connect to the Wi-Fi and more. You‚Äôll have access to a personal guidebook with suggestions on where to eat and shop in Paris as well as things to do in Le Marais.

Management reserves the right to enter the property for purposes of inspection, maintenance, cleaning, to show the unit to potential purchasers or tenants. This will be exercised in a reasonable fashion and always provide written notice in advance, except in cases of emergency. Your comprehension and cooperation are appreciated.

The 1st arrondissement of Paris is one of the most central districts of the historic heart of Paris. It includes in particular one of the oldest districts of the city, the district of Les Halles, which dates from the very beginning of the Middle Ages. Large churches were built from the Middle Ages to the classical period: Saint-Germain-L'Auxerrois, Saint-Eustache, Saint-Roch, the Oratory of the Louvre, Our Lady of the Assumption. This district also houses since the twelfth century the heart of popular Paris with the presence of halls that move in the 1970s and leave place at the Forum des Halles. It is also the district of palaces and luxury hotel: the Ritz, the Meurice, the Mandarin Oriental, the Westin Paris Vend√¥me, the hotel Costes, the hotel of the Louvre, the hotel Saint-James and Albany. Fashion boutiques have invaded rue Saint-Honor√©, one of the oldest arteries in Paris.

Nom: Louvre / Palais Royal Garden 2 Bedroom Triplex
Description_type: Vous aurez le logement (appartement) rien que pour vous.
Description:
By renting with us you are benefiting of over twenty years of experience, being one of the pioneer companies in Paris. You are certain to have professional yet friendly service and by renting one of our beautifully furnished Paris apartments we assure you, you will live like a Parisian and feel part of an authentic French neighborhood. All our apartments have been completely renovated and elegantly furnished to bring you modern comfort and style.

Le logement
The apartment has its own private entryway from the narrow street and also from the gardens. The flat is on three levels. The entryway and living room are on the ground floor. There are two cozy and small bedrooms and one full bath on the second floor and the kitchen and half bath (toilet, sink) are below the ground floor.

PLEASE NOTE that there are stairways leading from the entryway to the bedrooms and from the living room to the kitchen. They are fairly narrow and could pose a problem for someone elderly or someone who has trouble walking.

The apartment can sleep four adults. The living room has high ceilings and lovely floor to ceiling French windows that open onto the gardens and shops of Palais Royal. Next door to the apartment is a restaurant where you can sit out under the arches in summer and enjoy lunch or dinner. The restaurant closes at 11pm, but you will hear it before this if your windows are open.

It is appointed with a mix of antiques, cozy chairs, a dining table and a beautiful couch. There is color cable TV, a radio/CD player and a telephone. There is a queen sized bed in one bedroom, and a double in the other, and both bedrooms have built-in closets. We provide fans for all rooms as the apartment is not air conditioned.

One bedroom has a view of the Palais Royal Gardens, and the other overlooks rue Montpensier. The all marble modern bathroom has an American shower. The kitchen is fully equipped with a dishwasher, washer, dryer, oven, microwave and all necessary cooking appliances.

The combination of antiques, French windows and stylish renovations create old-world charm with modern comforts. Settle in, relax and enjoy your stay in this romantic city.

Autres remarques
‚Ä¢ Ipad and Internet Access WIFI is available and included in the rental of this apartment. We also provide an Ipad for your use, however, you are welcome to bring your own laptop and we will help you connect it.
The rental price is all inclusive, including fresh flowers, French wine and a treat, an iPad with high-speed internet access, all electricity and heating charges, sheets, bathrobes, towels, liquid soap and staples in the kitchen (bottled water, coffee, tea, sugar and more).

Description_type: Vous aurez le logement (appartement) rien que pour vous.
Description:
Lovely 1BR with Balcony Steps from the River Seine

Le logement
Apartment Overview:
- Charming 1 bedroom flat with a pull out sofa in the living room and a gorgeous sunny balcony with table and two chairs
- Perfect for a couple looking for a quiet romantic stay, or a family ‚Äì children are welcome!
- Comfortably accommodates up to 4 guests
5th floor apartment with an elevator in the building
- 60 square meter flat with kitchen, washing machine, cable TV and a free Wi-Fi connection
- Located close to all of the must-see Paris attractions ‚Äì the Seine and Ile St Louis, 5 Ile de la Cite and Notre Dame Cathedral, the Louvre and more!
- Nearest metro: Maubert Mutualit√© (Line 10)

About the apartment:
This 60sqm apartment is located on the 5th floor of a residential apartment building with an elevator. It features hardwood flooring throughout and decorative crown moulding. Upon entering the apartment, you are met with an entryway ‚Äì the bathroom is located just to your right. It is a full bathroom with a bath/shower combination, toilet, hand washbasin and small heater for your convenience. Luxurious and fluffy bath towels are provided for each guest. There is also a hair dyer in the flat so no need to pack one! Complementary toilet rolls, shower gel, shampoo and hand soap are also included to start of your stay. There is a clothes washing machine so you can pack light and save room for some unique Parisian souvenirs. A drying rack, iron and ironing board are also at your disposal.

Next door to the bathroom is the kitchen and dining room. There is a dining table for four people for when you prefer to eat at home rather than at one of the great restaurants nearby. The kitchen is fully equipped for your stay with a 2-plate induction stove top, microwave oven, toaster, kettle, coffee machine and more. Full sets of cutlery and crockery are provided along with pots and pans and other utensils. There is a dining table and chairs for four people so you may stay in and enjoy a home-cooked meal should you feel like it.

Next to the kitchen lies the cosy living room with a large sofa that can be pulled out to create sleeping space for an additional 2 people if needed. Extra linens are available for this bed. This room also has a large flat screen TV, allowing you to keep up to date with the international news, as well as a mix of French, English and foreign language channels. The living room also has access to the quaint balcony from which you enjoy views of the rooftops of Paris!

The master bedroom has a large double bed with French windows leading out onto the balcony. You have all the storage space you could need with a walk in cupboard and wardrobe just next to the bedroom with hanging space and drawers for all your clothes. Luxury towels and linens are provided and you will find the bed neatly made upon arrival.

The apartment is heated throughout during the winter months. There is no air conditioning but we will be happy to provide you with fans for your stay should warm temperatures be in the Paris weather forecast. A member of our Welcoming Team will meet you upon arrival, give you the keys and entry codes, a tour of the apartment and its appliances, help you to connect to the Wi-Fi and more. You‚Äôll have access to a personal guidebook with suggestions on where to eat and shop in Paris as well as things to do in Paris.

Nom: Parisian double room by Champs Elys√©es
Description_type: Chambre priv√©e dans : appartement. H√¥te : Happy
Description:
A lovely, cosy and comfortable double room in my apartment is available for rent. The room has WIFI access as well as storage space. We offer tea& coffee facilities in the bedroom, as well as a hairdryer. The bed very comfortable. The large, typically Parisian 140m2 apartment is ideally located- 5 minutes walk from the Champs Elys√©es- and ideal base to discover Paris! The flat has all the necessary amenities for your stay!! I look forward to welcoming you soon :)

Le logement
There is a large marble bathroom which is shared with my daughter and I. Lovely airy room in a large typical Parisian Haussmanian flat (140m2), located 200m from the Parc Monceau and 5 minutes walk to the Champs Elys√©es. We have several metro stops nearby (Etoile, Courcelles, St. Philippe du Roule).The neighbourhood is very residential, quiet on weekends, but very well located for visiting all of Paris or just chilling in the nearby parks. We have a big kitchen and lounge as well 2 other bedrooms. We rent one of the other rooms out to other Airbnb guests throughout the year.

The room that we're renting out can be rented by 1 or 2 people as it has a king size bed. the room has storage space also.

We're a Franco- British family with a 15 year old daughter as well as two lovely cats. Quiet, family, relaxing atmosphere. Wifi, clean linen & towels are included in the price. Washer & dryer available on request also.

The flat is located in the prestigious 8th Arrondissement of Paris. A fifteen to twenty minute walk will bring you to the"Faubourg Saint-Honor√©" haute couture shopping street (past the Elys√©e Palace) and the "Boulevard Haussmann", in the Opera Garnier area, which is world renown for the "Printemps" and "Galeries Lafayette" Department Stores , the largest beauty departments in the world, 45,000 squarem of shopping dedicated to fashion & luxury brands, as well as other labels such as GAP, H&M etc....Op√©ra being the biggest shopping area in Paris! If you're too tired to walk home, you can either catch a direct bus or metro home, it won't take you more than 15 minutes at the most! There are 2 Starbucks' restaurants nearby for the coffee addicts.

From the apartment, you can easily visit nearby attractions such as The Champs Elysees, the Arc of Triomphe, the Park Monceau, the Jacquemart Andr√© & Nissim de Commando museums all located only a few minutes away. You are spoilt for choice in terms of classical performances, you have the Opera Garnier not far or the "Salle Pleyel" which is a 5-6 minutes walk.

This area is also a great venue to go shopping, having a drink in a fancy lounge bar- the Hilton hotel is around the corner, they have a lovely lounge bar. There is also the "Ternes" area a 10 minutes walk away, which offers a wide variety of shops and restaurants. Other trendy bars & nightclubs are all very near. There are many cinemas with films in English on the Champs Elys√©es also. A visit to the Louvre museum is direct by metro (about 15 minutes door to door) followed by a picnic or romantic walk through the Tuileries gardens. The Eiffel Tower is about 20 minutes away by direct metro (line 6).

Once you have covered all of the neighbourhood, you can attack the rest of Paris easily from our place! There is a variety of different public transportation options to take you in 10 - 15 minutes to Ile de la Cit√© - Ile Saint-Louis, Ch√¢telet Les Halles, the Marais District or Latin quarter, Montmartre etc...amongst other options! Further out Versailles and Disneyland are also direct from Charles de Gaulle Etoile with the RER.

So much to discover, we hope you enjoy your stay in Paris!

Autres remarques
There are two lovely, friendly cats walking around the apartment. One is 1 and the other 5 years old. The older one is very discreet and lovable, the other is very sociable and loves to play as well as cuddles.

L'h√¥tel est ancien, ses fondations sont mill√©naires, elles peuvent remonter aux temps de l'Empire Romain, quand Paris s'appelait Lut√®ce : nous sommes proches des thermes romain de Cluny. L'ambiance y est √† √† la fois familiale et multiculturelle.

La Louisiane est un "h√¥tel litt√©raire", de nombreux artistes, peintres, sculpteurs et plasticiens, √©crivains et philosophes, musiciens - jazzmen, rockers, acteurs et cineastes, y ont v√©cu depuis 1900. Certains sont tr√®s c√©l√®bres, en voici quelques uns :

Musiciens :
Juliette Gr√©co (lived in the same room than Anabelle Buffet and Anne-Marie Casalis), Mouloudji, Boris Vian, the greatest jazzmen: Miles Davis, John Coltrane, Bud Powell, Lester Young, Chet Baker, Mal Waldron, Archi Sheep, Charlie Parker, Dexter Gordon, Ben Sidran, Wayne Shorte, and later rockstars like Jim Morrison and The Doors, Ray Manzarek, John Densmore, Robby Krieger ; and Pink Floyd, Roger Waters, David Gilmour, Rick Wright, Nick Mason...

Arts :
Salvador Dali and Amanda Lear, Bernard Buffet, Alberto Giacometti, Vassilakis Takis, Keith Haring, Dennis Oppenheim, Nam Jun Paik, Joseph Beuys, Lucian Freud, Benjamin Vautier, Cy Twombly, Eva & Adele, James Lee Byars, Wang Du, G-Wen, R√©gine Kolle, Barth√©l√©my Togo, Lionel Scoccimaro, Pascale Marthine Tayou, Chen Chieh-Jen, Julien Beneyton, Pascal Gilberti, Emmanuelle Villard, Franck et Olivier Turpin, Nicole Tran Ba Vang, Guillaume Paris, Fran√ßois Paire, Aim√© Ntakayica, Liu Ming, Philippe Mayaux, C√©cile Mathieu, Eric Le Maire, Patrick Lebret, Suzanne Junker, Yann Delacour, Gaston Damag, Jean-Luc Bichau, Pascal Bernier...

Here is a F.A.Q About the studio, hope it helps you have a better idea about your future experience with me

1. What is the rental process?
Just select your dates, number of people, and go through with the booking,

2. What would the total be for renting your place between certain dates?
It depends on what you select when you go through the booking (the price should be indicated once you have selected dates and number of people etc on the booking page for the apartment). ( cf. #1).

3. Would there be a deposit? If so how much would it be?
Yes there is. You pay it to AirBnB, and they give it back to you 2 days after you are out of the studio if everything goes normal.
I have never had a problem before, and all of my guests have collected their deposit back. The Deposit is 200‚Ç¨.

4. Would it accommodate two people?
Definitely. it works for a few days. A double bed is in.

5. Do you have Internet access?
Yes. There is WiFi Access. It is very fast.

6. Is this a secure building?
It is a very safe building.
First of all, it is a very safe neighborhood.
The street door requires a code to get in.

7. What time do we have to check in and check out?
With respect, check-in and check-out times are set since there is cleaning process in between before next guests arrive. We can, however, organise an early check-in and late check-out.

8. Are you close to public transportation?
Very close.
You have Cluny Sorbonne station less than 1mn away walking and Saint Michel RER station within 1mn away walking.

9. Is there grocery shopping/ caf√©s near your place?
If you are arriving on Sundays or a Bank Holidays , since it is Paris, all shops are opened until late.
There is everything you can dream of nearby.
There are heaps of Caf√©s and restaurants nearby, including my personal favorite for morning coffees and afternoon teas: "Le Dante", just down the street from the studio.

10. Is parking available?
Yes.

11. Do you have a washing machine?
Washing machine as well as dryer, are provided with the studio.

12. Is there anything we should know about your place?
It is comfy, with all-in at the very best location, Sorbonne/Notre Dame. In short, it is the perfect base for a wonderful Paris experience!

I look forward to hearing from you soon ! Please feel free to ask me if you have any further questions ...

Nom: Magical Rue des Martyrs
Description_type: Vous aurez le logement (appartement) rien que pour vous.
Description:
For visitors searching for an authentic French experience, the crustiest baguette, perfect melons, epicurean delicacies and to cook for themselves, there is no better place to rent an apartment and to pretend, even for a brief time, to live in Paris.

Our contact in Paris, Easyguests, will respond to your inquiry - continue to use this site or email: Paris@easyguests.com

Le logement
The space listed is for the entire apartment. Master and guest bedrooms each have ensuite showers and sinks, the ONE WC is off the entry/dining room
The apartment overlooks a wide, school courtyard full of chestnut trees and CHILDREN DURING RECESS. The noise of children playing can resound in the appartement, so if you are coming to Paris to spend a silent, soundless time in the apartment all day working or just hanging out please be aware. However, all rooms have double-paned windows which somewhat muffler sound from the courtyard. (SEE "Autres Remarques" for comments from former tenants.)
Guests won‚Äôt be bothered by disruptive or noisy neighbors; everyone in the building is very respectful of the rules in Paris that define the acceptable range of sound tolerance after 10 p.m. ("noise in repetition and volume must not disturb tranquility..."). That said, NO use of apartment washing machine, dryer or dishwasher BEFORE 8:00 a.m. (08h00) or AFTER 10 p.m. (22h00)

The apartment is on the 3rd floor with an elevator between floors. Half flight STAIRS up to reach elevator; half flight STAIRS down to reach apartment; therefore we can not list our property as accessible to people with limited mobility.

Paris is no longer comfortably cool in summer. Some homes are beginning to have AC, but we have yet to convert. Our apartment can be uncomfortable even with the bedrooms having ceiling fans plus added table or floor fans in other rooms which help but that don‚Äôt ‚Äúcool‚Äù the air.

Acc√®s des voyageurs
The entire apartment is available for tenants. Items in the apartment clearly not available to tenants, however, are in several dining room cupboards which will be obvious as they are closed with locks.

Autres remarques
PLEASE TAKE NOTE: THERE IS AN ADDITIONAL FEE OF Euros 35 FOR LATE ARRIVALS. CONTACT EASYGUESTS FOR MORE INFORMATION.

PLEASE DO NOT RUN THE WASHING MACHINE, CLOTHES DRYER OR DISHWASHER AFTER 10:00 P.M. or BEFORE 08:00 A.M. THIS IS FOR THE TRANQUILITY OF OUR NEIGHBORS DOWNSTAIRS. THANK YOU.

Description:
Centrally located vacation rental in Paris‚Äôs 1st Arrondissement, near the Louvre and Tuileries Gardens.

Le logement
Apartment Overview:
- 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment with balcony
- Comfortably accommodates up to 6 people

- Steps from the Louvre, Tuileries Gardens and Palais Royal

About the apartment:
This chic and airy 50sqm apartment is located on the 2nd floor of a charming Parisian building without an elevator. Upon entering the apartment, you are met with the open-plan kitchen, living and dining area. The fully equipped kitchen features a microwave, 2-plate electric stove, coffee machine, fridge and freezer, teakettle and more. The kitchen also comes with all the pots, pans, cutlery, utensils and crockery that you could need during your stay. There is a dining table that can comfortably seat 4 people so that you can enjoy a meal at home. The living area contains a comfortable sofa on which you can watch the flat screen television with cable after a long day of sightseeing. The couch can be converted into a bed to sleep two guests if required. Extra liens are provided for this bed. The Parisian balcony is accessible from the living area and offers some great views the city.

Just off the living area is the first bedroom at the front of the apartment with a double bed and ample storage space for your belongings. All bedding, pillows and sheets are provided and you will find each of the beds neatly made on arrival. This bedroom faces the street but is well-isolated thanks to its double glazed windows. Please note there is a window in the bedroom that faces the living area.

Moving towards the rear of the apartment is the main bathroom, tastefully decorated with china fittings and recently renovated. This bathroom has a stand-up shower, toilet, wash basin and mirror. Luxurious and fluffy bath towels are provided for six guests. There is also a hair dyer in the flat so no need to pack one! Complementary toilet rolls, shower gel, shampoo and hand soap are also included to start of your stay.

The second bedroom is located at the end of the hallway and contains a double bed as well as a small wardrobe. The second half-bathroom is accessible through this bedroom and contains a combination bathtub/shower and sink. There is also a clothes washing and drying machine so you can pack lightly and save some room for some Parisian souvenirs. An iron and ironing board are also at your disposal.

The apartment is heated throughout during the winter months. There is no air conditioning but we will be happy to provide you with fans for your visit should warm temperatures be in the Paris weather forecast. A member of our Welcoming Team will meet you upon arrival, give you the keys and entry codes, a tour of the apartment and its appliances, help you to connect to the Wi-Fi and more. You‚Äôll find a personal guidebook in the flat with suggestions on where to eat and shop in Paris.

Management reserves the right to enter the property for purposes of inspection, maintenance, cleaning, to show the unit to potential purchasers or tenants. This will be exercised in a reasonable fashion and always provide written notice in advance, except in cases of emergency. Your comprehension and cooperation are appreciated.

Description_type: Vous aurez le logement (appartement) rien que pour vous.

In the very center of the Latin Quarter, located close to the famous Panth√©on, charming Place de la Contrescarpe, Sorbonne University, Saint Germain & the gorgeous Luxembourg gardens, this apt offers a unique opportunity:
-It is an exceptional deal: the apt was designed with extra care to comfortably sleep up to 6 guests (2 queen beds & a comfortable sofa bed).
-It is located in a stone building constructed in the 1800s. The building was fully refurbished & redesigned by an architect in 2016.

Le logement
The owners have preserved the traditional French apartment style with the beautifully exposed wooden-beams. The apartment is super functional. They have also preserved the elegant French terra cotta tiled floor with a variation of colour and thickness in certain parts of the apartment. This floor style dates back to around 150 years, if not more, and is of great historical significance.

On entering the apartment, one is greeted by a small corridor that serves the bathroom to the right, and leads to the living room area.

To take advantage of the light and volume, the architect has designed a great concept:
‚Ä¢During the day, opening the 2 sliding doors create a unique large living space with two windows above the square. The light coming from both windows make the whole area most welcoming and spacious
‚Ä¢During the night, guests can profit from 3 separate, private sleeping areas.

The Living room offers a large double glazed window that bathes it in natural light. It opens on the charming Place Larue which offers various terraces. No building blocks the view: it is open on the Rue Sainte Genevieve, and the famous and beautiful courtyard of the Ecole Polytechnique (host to many international conferences of researchers).

The living room offers a comfortable sofa bed and a center table, chair and lights. Wall is decorated with frames. The TV is fixed above the kitchen bar a convenient location to watch it from the sofa bed.

On the right of the sofa is located an open kitchen bar with stools. It is integrated into the living area and given an impression of openness. The kitchen is fully equipped for preparing simple meals.

The bedroom with sliding doors offers a high quality queen size bed, a large closet and a large window on the square. Obviously complete privacy may be obtained by sliding the doors.

Through the kitchen, one can access the second bedroom. This bedroom also offers a very good quality queen size bed with closet, a mini office table and a window that overlooks the building courtyard. Once again it is furnished with quality equipment and decorated with frame.

The bathroom located at the entrance, is fully tiled and modernly decorated. It offers a large semi-enclosed shower, a vanity area and a toilet.

Le logement

The bedroom with sliding doors offers a high quality queen size bed, a large closet and a large window on the square. Obviously complete privacy may be obtained by sliding the doors.

Through the kitchen, one can access the second bedroom. This bedroom also offers a very good quality queen size bed with closet, a mini office table and a window that overlooks the building courtyard. Once again it is furnished with quality equipment and decorated with frame.

Nom: Unique 4 Bdr Triplex for 8 CORT
Description_type: Vous aurez le logement (appartement) rien que pour vous.
Description:
4 bdr, 3 bathrooms and 3 toilets in the best location of Montmartre in a calm street and 2 steps from the Sacr√© Coeur Basilic. It is linked to a Haussmanian type building but entrance is totaly independant. Like a house in Paris.

Le logement
Set over 3 floors (basement, first floor, second floor), this wooden floored apartment can accommodate up to 8 guests (6 adults max and 2 children). The apartment is 140 m¬≤. The common space consists of a large living room open on a private courtyard with greeneries, an wide open kitchen / dining area and a basement recreational/bedroom area with extra spleeping space on the sofa as well as large storage area. The character of this triplex makes it unique.

On entering the apartment you will find a flight of stairs going upwards in front and another to the right going down. On taking the short flight of stairs up you will arrive at the first floor which is approx 2 meters higher than the street level. Thanks to the huge bay windows of both sides, the apt bathes in natural light.

The first floor is divided into:
- The living room
- The open kitchen / dining area
- Toilet
- Bedroom 1 with en-suite bathroom

The living room is bright and spacious, and offers comfortable sofas, a centre table and a modern chimney (for decoration only). It gives a very warm feeling thanks to the red colour pieces of furniture and its direct view and access to the courtyard surrounded with greeneries.

The modern open kitchen, located to the left, is organised lengthwise. It is intelligently conceived so as to make maximum use of the available space. It has a long ilot with bar and is fully equipped for preparing your favourite meals. All equipments are top notch. The washer and the drier are hidden in a large closet.

To the left of the kitchen itself develops the dining area, facing a large window with curtains. It can comfortably seat up to 8 guests.

The architect managed openings from the living room to the kitchen so that one can always see what is happening in the other space.

To the right of the kitchen a small corridor leads to the master bedroom. Just before, immediately to the left, you will find a toilet.

Breakfast will not get any better - You can begin your day with croissants and a hot cup of coffee in the private courtyard in the morning. The Master bedroom stays along the courtyard. It offers direct view and access to it through a typical painters‚Äô studio glass door. The bedroom offers a comfortable queen-size bed and an en-suite tiled bathroom which offers a shower and a vanity area. The bedroom offers a wardrobe.

The private courtyard, a unique benefit of this Parisian triplex, is located on the first floor. Its area is around 35m2. It can be accessed from the living room, the kitchen area and the bedroom. It is equipped with tables and chairs and is perfect for a glass of wine after a day of sightseeing.


The 2nd Floor :
Towards the back of the kitchen, a flight of stairs leads to the 2nd floor.
It has a corridor and offers 2 bedrooms, one full bathroom with a toilet and storage.

The first door to the right leads to Bedroom 2. The bedroom is incredibly bright thanks to its 2 large windows that offer a clear view of the rooftops. The bedroom will offers a comfortable double bed (was ordered but presently a single bed ask to confirm), storage space.

The next door to the left leads to Bedroom 3. This bedroom is more tuned to welcome 2 children. It offers 2 comfortable single beds (presently a single bed ask to confirm), storage space and 2 windows that overlooks the private courtyard. A nice baby bed is present in the bedroom (ask to confirm).

Left at the end of the corridor is the second bathroom which offers a shower, with a vanity area and a toilet.


The Basement :
The fourth bedroom is an open bedroom located in basement. One accesses this bedroom by using the staircase right of the apartment entrance. Bedroom 4 offers a comfortable high quality queen-size sofa bed. It also profits from natural light, thanks to the huge bay windows along the staircase wall and offers a sliding door.

Walking across the bedroom and once passed the sliding doors, is a corridor with storage space all along the wall. To the left of the corridor is located the 3rd mosaic tiled bathroom. This bathroom offers a shower, a vanity area and a toilet.

On exiting the apt, you will find yourself directly opposite the ‚ÄúMontmartre Museum‚Äù. Going right will take you to the ‚ÄúPlace du Tertre‚Äù in a minute, where the painters will draw your portrait and the ‚ÄúSacre Coeur‚Äù Basilic with is large gardens. To the left, you have the ‚ÄúAvenue Junot‚Äù, the most prestigious location in Montmartre passing nearby the ‚ÄúMontmartre‚Äôs vines‚Äù.

Once guest reservation is confirmed we will both sign a lease agreement coherent with Airbnb terms and conditions.

Acc√®s des voyageurs
The apt is entirely dedicated to the guest's stay.
